casebody.data:
Gary COOKE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 8, 2016

James E. Mortimer, in support of the petition.

Adam E. Mattei, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Gary Cooke's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 902, 149 A.3d 502 (2016), is denied.
